short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enabling Salespeople to share contextual content with buyers in one click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A smart email plugin that enables B2B salespeople to close more deals by making it easy to share contextual content with buyers.

When a salesperson wants to share a sales content over email with a  buyer, he/she can easily call a smart plugin from the inbox. The plugin surfaces the most relevant contents for the context of email conversation based on the specific stage of that deal in CRM, based on buyer persona, based keywords and prior context. With a single click, the salesperson can share the most relevant information so easily with the buyer.
